description: There will be no routes from Guernsey to Heathrow throughout the summer season.
title: Flybe Guernsey-Heathrow link cancelled
title_page: Flybe Guernsey-Heathrow link cancelled - BBC News
maintext: Deputy Charles Parkinson said: "Whilst it is very disappointing that we will not be able to continue the Heathrow service into the summer season, we are very pleased that Flybe did confirm during our discussions that, from the beginning of May, they will fill the gap and operate the London Southend route."
